data.name: Hyper Hook
data.detailed_description:
Experience freedom of movement like never before in Hyper Hook!

Hook and Swing

Learn how to master a highly responsive double hook system, allowing you to make very precise moves and avoid all the obstacles.

Hook & Seek

Show your skill in a game mode that does not limit your movements!

Find and hook all the spheres as fast as possible and replay each level with the knowledge of your previous runs, to go even faster and find the optimal trajectories!

Accessibility

Set the time to flow slower to remove any motion sickness and to give yourself more time to think about your next move!

Build

Use the map builder tool to create any level you want, and make the ultimate grappling hook experience!
data.about_the_game:
Experience freedom of movement like never before in Hyper Hook!

data.short_description: HyperHook is a grappling hook centric VR arcade game set in fractured landscapes full of vibrant colors. Rank up as the top hook expert, or build your own maps to create the ultimate grappling hook experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
